backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, notes, likes, and access‑controlled CRUD operations with map‑based storage and sorting utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Describes a feature report linking a background image feature to affected frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files covering styling, hooks, components, and app logic.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the app root and applying persisted theme before rendering.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component with error boundary, login screen, auth gating, profile setup flow, and main feed wrapped in background and watermarks.
frontend/src/components/AdminModerationQ: Empty placeholder file for an admin moderation dialog component.
frontend/src/components/CommentWithAvata: Renders a comment with user avatar and metadata using public profile lookup.
Displays a fixed footer watermark with theme‑aware styling.
frontend/src/components/Feedback.tsx: Provides reusable loading, empty, and error UI states with retry support.
frontend/src/components/FeedBackground.t: Wraps content with a fixed background image and overlay for readable contrast.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Top‑level layout with header, footer, sidebar, profile editing, and authenticated user avatar display.
frontend/src/components/LikeButton.tsx: Renders a like button that triggers a like mutation, prevents double likes, and displays the current like count.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling login state and errors.
frontend/src/components/NoteActions.tsx: Offers star, pin, edit, delete, and report actions for a note with permission checks and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/NoteCard.tsx: Displays a summary card for a note with metadata, author info, truncated text, and a like button.
frontend/src/components/NoteForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing notes with validation, mutation calls, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/NoteLikersDialog: Dialog showing a list of users who liked a note, with loading, error, and empty states.
Slide‑over reader showing full note details with actions, like controls, and author info.
frontend/src/components/NotesFeed.tsx: Displays a searchable, paginated list of notes with sorting, creation, and editing, handling loading, errors, and profile checks.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog for creating or editing a user profile, including validation and profile photo upload/removal.
frontend/src/components/SidebarDrawer.ts: Left-side drawer providing theme toggle and access to the user directory dialog.
frontend/src/components/Toasts.tsx: Provides a top‑center toaster for global notifications.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Renders a user avatar with photo or initials and manages profile photo URL lifecycle.
frontend/src/components/UserDirectoryDia: Dialog listing all users with search, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks for fetching and saving the current user’s profile with react‑query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context for Internet Identity, handling login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useLikedNotes.ts: Manages liked note IDs per user principal using localStorage and provides helpers to check and mark likes.
frontend/src/hooks/useNoteLikers.ts: Fetches the list of users who liked a specific note via react-query and the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: Provides note list and single-note fetch hooks with polling and caching via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesMutations.ts: Defines mutations for creating, updating, deleting, liking, starring/pinning, and reporting notes with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfilePhotoMutati: Adds and removes the caller's profile photo and refreshes related profile caches.
Fetches a public user profile by principal for displaying avatars.
frontend/src/hooks/useResumeRefresh.ts: Refreshes note data when the page regains focus or is restored from bfcache.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Stores and toggles light/dark theme preference with localStorage and DOM class updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDirectory.ts: Fetches the full user directory from the backend with loading state helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes with UI tweaks.
frontend/src/lib/cacheKeys.ts: Centralized react-query cache key definitions for notes and user profiles.
frontend/src/lib/errors.ts: Normalizes errors into readable messages and identifies retryable error types.
frontend/src/lib/profilePhoto.ts: Utilities for converting profile photo bytes to URLs, cleaning them up, validating files, and converting files for upload.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with react-query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, sizing, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, features, architecture decisions, and known issues for a mobile‑optimized collaborative notes web app.
